name: @alexandria/relay_selector
description: A Rust WASM library for algorithmically choosing Nostr relays

tasks.build: deno task prebuild && wasm-pack build --target bundler --out-dir pkg/bundler
tasks.wasmbuild: deno task prebuild && deno run -A jsr:@deno/wasmbuild@0.19.3 --inline --project relay_selector --js-ext mjs
